price: Dan mereka berkata, "Mengapa dia tidak membawa tanda (bukti) kepada kami dari Tuhannya?" Bukankah telah datang kepada mereka bukti (yang nyata) sebagaimana yang tersebut di dalam kitab-kitab yang dahulu?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا يَأۡتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ تَأۡتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā yatīnā biāyatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu mā fī al-ṣuḥufi al-ūlā
